titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation of Members of the Senate in the case of Bobbie Hill v. Bill Clinton, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators Dale Bumpers and David Pryor in the case of Bobbie Hill v. Bill Clinton, et al.
